QuestData.Title: Sealing the Dream
QuestData.Description: It is ready. Take this, $n; a beacon of natural essence, blessed by the will of Ysondre.$B$BTo the east, on the other side of the flowing brook, is Dream Bough. There stands the Great Tree, the tallest in Feralas, a sapling of the World Tree itself. A portal to the heart of the Emerald Dream sits in its trunk, and it is this portal you must seal.$B$BThe portal will be guarded, but you must be brave. May the Earth Mother watch over you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Ysondre's Tear to seal the portal at Dream Bough.
QuestData.CompletionText: The portal must be sealed, $n. Do not falter.
QuestData.RewardText: The corruption has been stemmed! The forest can begin to heal now.$B$BMay you have the blessing of the Earth Mother wherever you go, friend.
